changelogversion.changelogtext: [u]New! [/u]Tags dialogs now shows colors and selection happens with just one click
[u]New! [/u]When an app crash happens you'll be informed (for transparency) and you can insert a comment
[u]Fixed[/u] Resolved multiselection wrong coloration
[u]Fixed[/u] Resolved many check-list issues
[u]New! New stable version is out!![/u]
[u]New![/u] Chinese language support (thanks ContactFront from XDA)
[u]New![/u] Tags colors have been moved to pastel family for a better looking and can be set to cover not only the small tag markers in notes but also the full note item!
[u]New![/u] More elegant password setting screen. Now, if trying to lock a note without having inserted a security password before, you'll be prompted for it just once.
[u]New![/u] Notification ringtone customizable from settings
[u]New![/u] New sharing mode
[u]New![/u] Tags creations and deletions are now notified with color contextual dialogs
[u]New![/u] Added opacity bar in Sketch and fixed popup position
[u]New![/u] Swedish language support (thanks Mattias Lundqvist)
Tags are now ordered by name, when name is left blank the tag will stay on tail
Updated Turkish translation
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash when trying to delete a backup on some devices
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash when switching to other app while drawing a sketch
[u]New![/u] Actionbar and navigation bar transparency in KitKat
[u]New![/u] Reminder date and time picker support for smaller devices
[u]New![/u] Spanish language support (thanks Sergio Iglesias)
[u]New![/u] Slovak language support (thanks Pyler)
[u]New![/u] Something is happened to Mr.Jingles...
Note editor screen margins changed to optimize screen usage and to perform more easily touch operations on "location" and "reminder" items
Updated Russian language
[u]New![/u] Beautiful info messages replaced to standard Android toasts popup
[u]New![/u] When a problem occurs the application will not disturb you anymore and will automatically send the issue report if connection is available
[u]New![/u] French language support (thanks Kowalski OmniROM and Adrien Pegon)
Updated Dutch and Italian translations
[u]Fixed[/u] Deletion of sketch when orientation is changed is avoided forcing portrait mode
[u]Fixed[/u] A couple of crashes when tagging notes are nore resolved
[u]New![/u] More contextualization: now [i]Lock or unlock[/i] and [i]Toggle checklist[/i] items in editor menu changes depending on the note status
Many layout modifications
[u]Fixed[/u] Lot of fixes thanks to beta testers feedback
[u]Fixed[/u] Sorting by reminder date criteria
[b]New![/b] Notes can now be sorted by ascending reminder date
[b]New![/b] If a note is locked its content is not masked in notes' list
When a note is going to be tagged and no tags already exist the tag creation window is shown
[u]Fixed[/u] Finally resolved bug affecting Samsung keyboard and Flesky that caused app crashing when trying to write title or content on empty field and when double-tapping to select text
[u]Fixed[/u] App crashing from when a new note with new-line only is inserted untile when app data are erased
[u]Fixed[/u] Tag color is no more reset to default color when saving it without changes
[b]New![/b] Add hand-sketches to your notes!
[b]New![/b] Automatic updates check will tell you when a new version is out (not applied to Beta releases)
[b]New![/b] Revisited settings screen to better keeping usable the growing number of options
[u]Fixed[/u] Corrected checklist behavior on saving when "keep checked items" and "keep checkmarks" options are not selected and refined deletion icon size and action timings
[u]Fixed[/u] Attachments' popup sizes fit now the content
[b]New![/b] You can now easily convert from simple text note to [b]checklist[/b] and vice versa
[b]New![/b] 12-hours mode available
[b]New![/b] Added ACRA for managing crash reports and send me errors information
Tag markers layout modified: slightly thicker and now both in notes list or in detail will appear like a vertical-left-border for the container card element
German translation updated (thanks to Lycox MB)
[u]Fixed[/u] attachments added when discarding note changes will be correctly removed
[u]Fixed[/u] wrong tag association when just one note without previous tag was selected
[u]Fixed[/u] Crashes with Samsung or Flesky keyboards
[u]Fixed[/u] Possible crashes on tags creation
[u]Fixed[/u] Backup notes with default export name now works
[b]New![/b] Dutch translation (thanks to Martin Coulon)
[b]New![/b] German translation (thanks to Lycox MB)
[b]New![/b] Russian translation (thanks to Abdullah Amir)
[u]Fixed[/u] Restored correct animated indicator to open left sliding menu
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash on locking a newly created note fixed
[b]New![/b] Portugese (Brazil) translation (thanks to Eduardo Riva)
Many bugs resolved thanks to your signalations
[b]New![/b] Italian translation
[b]New![/b] Turkish translation (thanks to ufkeee)
Removed archive/unarchive actions when navigation differs from Notes or Archived to avoid mistakes
[u]Fixed[/u] Error on device reboot that caused reminders not restored
[b]New![/b] Audio attachments now are shown with their name to avoid confusing them
Faster app launches thanks to heavy code cleaning
Batch tagging notes on list now pre-sets actual tag if just one note is selected
[u]Fixed[/u] Playing audio recordings without having stopped the previuos one now works correctly
[u]Fixed[/u] Tags colored circle are now displayed also on versions previously than Jelly Bean
[b]New![/b] More efficient backup management (including deletion and size details)
Reduced app installer size
The improved Settings section now includes a more verbose description for the various options and an About item containing infos on the opensource project
Lot of graphical modifications and UI cleaning: fonts homogeneous, transparencies, screens titles, elements padding reduces to optimize spaces...
[u]Fixed[/u] Notes icon indicators are now correctly aligned
[u]Fixed[/u] After searching and editing a note the keyboard will no longer appear if unrequested
[u]Fixed[/u] Error on widget positioning and wrong backup restore in Android versions minor than 4.0.0
[b]New![/b] Associate notes with colored [u]tags[/u] to categorize and filter them!
[b]New![/b] Protect single notes from unauthorized accesses using a security password
[u]Fixed[/u] Many other minor issues have been resolved
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash on start with spanish language
Implemented card-like interface for notes list elements
Added fading animation to location text
[u]Fixed[/u] Notes list scrollbar position
[u]Fixed[/u] High battery consumption
[b]New! [/b]Show only notes with reminder from navigation drawer
Application size reduced cleaning code and libraries
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash on app openinig if coming from stable release
Added placeholders for image inside note editor
[u]Fixed[/u] Notes list is no more loaded twice on application startup
[u]Fixed[/u] Old reminders are no more repeated after reboot
[u]Fixed[/u] Crash on exiting note after reminder notification
[u]Fixed[/u] Reminder chooser setting wrong time by default
[u]Fixed[/u] Minor bugs
[b]New! [/b]OmniNotes can now receive also shared videos and audio recordings from other apps

[b]New! [/b]"Reset All Data" option from settings behavior changed. All application data have been moved to private directory on external memory so you can simply use default system data and cache cleaning
[b]New! [/b]Backup process completely rewritten. Now it's managed by a service and also attachments will be saved
[b]New! [/b]Added a setting to limit maximum video size
Performances boosted up saving attachments thanks to memory accesses optimizations
Much faster note deletion thanks to asynchronous processing (batch deletion too)
Migrated compatibility library to Google's official AppCompat
[u]Fixed[/u] Sharing notes to or receiving shared data from other apps now fills correctly the title field
[u]Fixed[/u] note deleting failure when trying to delete from inside note detail
[u]Fixed[/u] missing attachments deletion
[b]New! [/b]Video recording
[b]New! [/b]Audio recording and playback
Note modification date is not updated if no changes are made
[u]Fixed[/u] crash on application opening happening on many devices
[u]Fixed[/u] image opening with wrong applications (ex. torrent, file manager)
[b]New! [/b]Widget!!
[b]New! [/b]Consistency improved by making a copy of attachments, now if original is deleted Omni Notes has its own ones
Updated search icon to match the standard one from holo light theme
[u]Fixed[/u] impossibility to open image attachments in gallery
[u]Fixed[/u] slowing down waiting location retrieval, now process is parallelized
[u]Fixed[/u] missing refresh of note list after inserting note with heavy images
[b]New! [/b]Now is possible to share contents from other apps to Omni Notes!
[b]New! [/b]Image attachments are shared too
[b]New! [/b]Links recognition in notes content and title activable via option in settings
[b]New! [/b]Brand new icon and notification icon
[b]New! [/b]Asynchronous note saving and loading makes everithing faster
Improved sharing function that includes also image attachments
Changed the behavior of deleting action in notes detail: now you have to long-press on item (image, location, reminder) and give confirmation
Notes are now saved also if there is no text but just attachments, position or reminder set
Added selection color on objects click
Now sorting by date is done in descendant order
[u]Fixed[/u] multiple reminder notification misbehavior related to wrong note detail opening
[u]Fixed[/u] location insertion error
[u]Fixed[/u] image attachments crop to fill a regular grid
[b]New! [/b]Notes geolocation!
[b]New! [/b]Replaced standard date and time pickers with the new beautiful one from Android 4.3 ported backward to older devices
Moved attachment icon on first position in note detail page
[u]Fixed[/u] reminder bug showind notification with some delay and giving error on notification opening when the note was created first time
[b]New! [/b]Attachments to notes using camera or gallery images
[b]New! [/b]A remainder can be set to receive notes notifications
[b]New! [/b]New icons in notes list showing archived status, attachments and reminders
[b]New! [/b]Added changelog screen in preferences
[b]New! [/b]Removed language choosing from preferences, system locale will be used automatically instead
Layout and keyboard popup revisited with an eye to small screen devices
Lot of bugs fixes and improvements
[b]New! [/b]Splashscreen added
[b]New! [/b]Totally removed Ads
[u]Fixed[/u] layout for small phones
INFO section in settings
Bugfixes
Bugfixed and graphic adjustments
[b]New! [/b]Spanish localization
[b]New! [/b]Added animations
Notes list more cards-like
Performance improvements
[u]Fixed[/u] issues when searching
Drastically reduced minimum Android version to 2.2
[b][u]Out of closed BETA![/u][/b]
[b]New! [/b]Italian localization
[b]New! [/b]Confirmation on batch deleting
Totally rewritten to achieve compatibility with tablet format
Fix Whatsapp sharing
[b]New! [/b]Note searching
[b]New! [/b]New font Roboto Slab
New export and import functions using csv file
Settings revisited
New export and import functions using csv file
Settings revisited
Basical functions available: inserting, deleting (batch mode too), sorting with various criteria and notes sharing
Initial commit
